relations
---
(A * B) mod C = (A mod C * B mod C) mod C
(A + B) mod C = (A mod C + B mod C) mod C
(A - B) mod C = (A mod C - B mod C) mod C
A^B mod C = ( (A mod C)^B ) mod C 

rules
---
gen ( x*p +  k + m) % m
new (-1*p + -1 + m) % m
cut ( 1*p + -i + m) % m
inc ( i*p +  0 + m) % m

 1 -6 cut 6
 7  0 deal with increment 7
-1 -1 deal into new stack

( 1*p + -6 + m) % m
( 7*p +  0 + m) % m
(-1*p + -1 + m) % m

a*x+b

c*(a*x+b)+d
ca*x+cb+d

a%m = a - A*q


------
